description: Denial records associated with this payment for evaluating denial rate metrics.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RELATED_BDC_ID
columns.description: Returns denial records associated with this payment for purposes of denial rate calculations. Denials with a 18-Duplicate Claim/Service remittance reason are not included in denial rate metrics. Only denials that have been converted to the Denial/Remark/Correspondenceï¿½framework are included here.
